candidates.description: This is a Next.js, Tailwind CSS blogging starter template. Comes out of the box configured with the latest technologies to make technical writing a breeze. Easily configurable and customizable. Perfect as a replacement to existing Jekyll and Hugo individual blogs.

candidates.description: ⚡️  一个 Next.js (v16) 快速启动模板, 集成 Tailwind CSS (v4) + React (v19) + Nextra (v4) + TypeScript + Shadcn UI + Radix UI + Aceternity UI + ESLint(v9) + Sass, 支持 Iconify 图标集, i18n 多语言国际化 - 响应式、暗黑模式落地页、适合开发个人博客 Blog Starter Template, 含示例代码, Deployed on Netlify and Vercel.
